## Loading and preprocessing the data

Unzip the _activity.zip_ file in the _data_ folder:

```{r}
zip_file <- "activity.zip"
data_folder <- "data"
if (dir.exists(data_folder)) {
  unlink(data_folder, recursive = TRUE)
}

unzip(zip_file, exdir = data_folder)
```
